title: Fun to sample new places and save food
text: I have only done this 3 times but this last one was the charm. Super delicious food and plentiful. My other two experiences were not nearly as good. Willing to keep trying.

title: Not bad

title: Works great in NYC
text: Have used multiple times in Manhattan, lots of restaurants/groceries to choose from. Usually comes with a variety of good items, have yet to be disappointed! Totally worth it.

title: Good if you‚Äôre in the area
text: If you are going to be in the area, then it‚Äôs worth it. But it‚Äôs not worth it if you have to drive across town (or beyond) for it. Regarding value of the items I‚Äôve received, I would say it‚Äôs like a buy 2 get 1 free value.

title: Best invention ever!
text: Just brilliant!! Saves waste , makes money and everyone is happy. Great idea.

title: Budget Friendly Eats
text: Love this app! Perfect way to eat on a budget.

title: Great concept!
text: Love it!  Wish the app notifications could be set for specific locations when they post availability.  Also, users should be able to view the review comments/photos to get a better idea what has been in previous bags.

title: Impressed
text: First time using this and found a pickup available at my local bagel shop in town. I got 18 bagels that were made in the morning and I picked up at 2:30 in the afternoon. The value is incredible. A single bagel with peanut butter and jelly costs $6.30. With this app I got 18 bagels at 55 cents each. Yes, you can tell many of the pieces are not as fresh as when you buy in the morning. But they are still very soft. I split each in half, wrapped them in parchment, and now I have 3 months of bagels in my freezer :-) It‚Äôs so sad how much restaurant food goes to waste at the end of each day.

title: Great concept and Delicious food!
text: I love everything about this app! This app makes it easy and simple to choose from places near by and for a great value too. I will warn those with allergens that you don‚Äôt know what you‚Äôre getting so be alert when picking up your food. Other than that I recommend this app for those who aren‚Äôt picky and love trying new food! 10/10. This app definitely needs more recognition!

title: Stewart‚Äôs East Brunswick
text: Amazing experience. I got SIX huge slices for ten dollars! Amazing!

title: Dumpster diving for the bourgeoise
text: We like because it is a great bargain and it helps with food waste which is very important to us!

title: Good Quality Food for the Price
text: I have never had a store I‚Äôve picked up food at that wasn‚Äôt delicious. Each store has given a good amount of food for the price paid and best part is the food isn‚Äôt wasted!

title: Not sure about this
text:
I'm reluctant to this service because they have poor reviews on TrustPilot about lack of customer service AND they don't allow personalized reviews on the app itself (star rating per restaurant means very little) so the lack of transparency is concerning. 

Won't try until changes are made, otherwise seems shady, even if the intention might be to not waste food...

title: Excellent idea for foodies
text: A great way to try establishments and become a returning customer!

title: Great app but doesn‚Äôt show detail reviews
text: I enjoy the service and discovering area restaurants. They need to provide access to detailed reviews from other users, just providing readings from store is not enough. There is rating inflation. Now I only go to the highest rated ones, since I have little clue.

title: App is awesome!
text: Great deals on food. Only drawback is that they don‚Äôt have an alarm to let you know it‚Äôs time to pick up so you need to set your own alarms.

title: Love this app just one minor thing
text: I love this app! I‚Äôm a software designer so I suggest one thing. Please make sure you make it known to not press the button before you get to the attendant who‚Äôs giving you your order.

title: What a treat!
text: We‚Äôve been enjoying expanding our experience by trying new things we wouldn‚Äôt normally try.

title: Amazing

title: Great app to save money, help local businesses and the environment!
text: This is such a cool app that helps you get delicious food that could have gone to a landfill at a very affordable price. It‚Äôs a win-win for everyone! Thank you so much, Too Good to Go!

title: How does Surprise Bag offer sell out every day within a second of offer?
text:
Generally very very happy with the entire concept of Two Good To Go.  It‚Äôs an inexpensive ( mostly) fun food surprise. If it helps with food waste ( maybe) even better! 
The single thing that perplexes or confounds me is the stores that offer surprise bags at a designated time ‚Äúcheck back later at 9:16‚Äù , for example. I have attempted to acquire some surprise bag offers for weeks at the designated time, but no matter my ‚Äúreadiness‚Äù
to pounce on the offer, it sells out instantly. I am saying instantly- turns say 9:00 pm  & the surprise bag is gone by 9:00:01 seconds. I am sure that people, maybe the same people every day? Have figured out how to set up the transaction for instant purchase. Maybe the business is only making  one offer, however it is still instantly gone every day. Not quickly, instantly. 
Perhaps I am just not quick enough for the very popular offers, other than that I enjoy the whole idea of TwoGoodToGo very much, it‚Äôs  quite a clever concept.

title: Great idea to save food
text: They are all very good neighborhood stores. Great value for money and great idea not to waste food.

title: Wonderful app!
text: I love this app so much.  A win-win situation for both parties and the earth!  Keep it up.  üòÄ

title: Great Donuts
text: Great quality, fresh, came with a dozen. an amazing price. So worth it. Taste amazing. Doing it again!

title: Wish for more restaurants
text: Daytime pickups are mostly bagel places. Evening pickups are late times, so I haven‚Äôt done a restaurant at night which are mostly pizza places. There are not a lot of restaurants in my area.

title: Googan‚Äôs Galley
text: First time in establishment but plan on going back soon. Spent many summers years ago in Essex and looking forward to trying some of many other choices on menu. Employees working the day I visited were extremely friendly and welcoming.

title: Why have I not done this sooner!!
text: This is genius! A lot of these places are already shops I know. Some are new, but I can‚Äôt wait to try the new spots. AND I‚Äôm helping food waste??? NO BRAINER. DONE & DONE

title: So Happy
text:
As someone living paycheck to paycheck I absolutely love this app for still being able to get freshly made food and drinks and still not go crazy with a budget. It‚Äôs extremely easy to pick a bag, check in on your phone, and simply show the cashiers.

My only issue with this app is that some of the family and friends I recommend this app to do have allergy issues. One has a tomato allergy and the other has a peanut butter issue that can‚Äôt consume anything that touches it. And while they generally eat anything else besides that, it would be nice to be able to give a store a heads up in advance. Even if we like surprises and mysteries for the bags, it would be nice to at least make sure we can at least try to avoid some allergies.

title: Win win!
text: This app is great for a young family who looks to eat on a budget, while also helping restaurants not waste food :)

title: Love
text: Great idea to help business owners! I know they like to give but still need to make profit!

title: Amazing program
text: I got my very first surprise bag at Ward Berry farm in Sharon. There was dill and collard greens and brussels sprouts and a large cookie and parsley and grapes. I was so happy with everything that was in there. It was the best experience. Thank you for the businesses that participate. It is a great shop and everybody was so nice and I will be back to shop inside :-)

title: Such a win win
text: I hope this app just keeps growing! It‚Äôs a great idea well executed, and I‚Äôm a vegetarian, so I don‚Äôt even have the full selection and I still get great value. Save food, save money, spread the word!

title: The best app I have ever used
text: This app is incredible. It‚Äôs a perfect example of what this world needs more of- businesses that look to fill gaps in demand and that can help to fight waste and improve efficiency in our society. As a young student, I‚Äôve relied on this app a lot, 20-30 times, and it has let me down maybe once. I‚Äôve recommended it to almost everyone who‚Äôs in my position. I only hope for it to keep growing and spreading to more restaurants
